com.varmateo.yawg.spi

Interface TemplateContext


  • public interface TemplateContext
    Data available to a template during processing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TemplateContext.Author
      Document author data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<TemplateContext.Author> authors()
      The authors of the document.
      String bakeId()
      Randomly generated unique bake identifier.
      String body()
      The raw HTML contents of the baked document.
      String pageUrl()
      The URL of the page being baked relative to the root directory of the site.
      PageVars pageVars()
      Set of variables available to the page template.
      String rootRelativeUrl()
      The URL of the root directory of the site being baked relative to the document about to be baked.
      String title()
      The title of the document, as extracted from its source.

    • Method Detail

      • authors

        Iterable<TemplateContext.Author> authors()
        The authors of the document. It may be an empty list.

      • body

        String body()
        The raw HTML contents of the baked document. This is actually an HTML snippet appropriate for inclusion under a <body> tag, or any other block level element.

      • pageUrl

        String pageUrl()
        The URL of the page being baked relative to the root directory of the site.

      • pageVars

        PageVars pageVars()
        Set of variables available to the page template. These variables are immutable.

      • rootRelativeUrl

        String rootRelativeUrl()
        The URL of the root directory of the site being baked relative to the document about to be baked.

      • title

        String title()
        The title of the document, as extracted from its source.

      • bakeId

        String bakeId()
        Randomly generated unique bake identifier. Each bake will have a different identifier.
